Trang ch / Sn phm / M THANH HI THO / LOA THNG BO / LOA NN - LOA PHNG THANH / LOA NN TOA / LOA NN VNH TRN TOA TC-615

LOA NN VNH TRN TOA TC-615

Lin h

KHUYN MI

Danh mc: M THANH HI THO, M THANH HI THO, LOA NN - LOA PHNG THANH, LOA NN TOA, LOA THNG BO
  • GIAO HNG MIN PH
  • CAM KT GI TT
  • DCH V H TR 24/7
  • MIN PH LP T
  • HNG DN S DNG TI NH
  • H tr trc tuyn
    0936 15 0936
  • M t
  • Thng s k thut
  • nh gi (0)

Gii thiu v loa nn phn x vnh trn 15W TOA TC – 615 chnh hng, gi r :

 

 

Trong nhiu trng hploa nnvnh ch nht khng p ng c yu cu th loa nn vnh trn s l phng n thay th hon ho. Loa nn vnh trn cho m thanh to hn, i xa hn v c s dng ch yu cho h thng m thanh thng bo ngoi tri. Binh Minh Audio xin gii thiu vi cc bn sn phm loa nn TOA TC – 615thuc dng loa nn vnh trn c cng sut 15W v khng bin p c chng ti nhp khu chnh hng t Indonesia, vi y giy t , chng ch v c bo hnh 12 thng trn ton quc.

 

c im ni tri ca loa nn phn x vnh trn TOA TC – 615 :

 

 

Loa nn vnh trn TOA TC – 615c thit k theo tiu chun IP-65 chng bm bi, chng nc m bo hot ng lu di trong iu kin thi tit nng ma tht thng. Loa TOA TC – 615 thng c s dng lm loa truyn tin ca x hay loa thng bo ca phng, loa trong cc nh xng sn xut c mc ting n ln.

 

TOA TC – 615 c thkt ni vi nhau to nn h thng loa thng bo. c bit im nhn ln nht ca loa TOA TC – 615 l c th tng thch vi hu ht amply hi tho c trn th trng, tuy nhin sn phm vn cho cht lng v hiu sut m thanh tt hn khi kt hp vi amply TOA.

 

a ch mua lao nn vnh trn TOA TC – 615 uy tn, tin cy :

 

 

Hin nay loa nn vnh trn TOA TC -615 ang c bn ti Binh Minh Audio mt trong nhng a ch a ch cung cp sn phmTOAchnh hng vi cht lng v gi thnh tt nht th trng hin nay.

 

n viBinh Minh Audiobn s c t vn la chn mt cch nhit tnh bi i ng chm sc khch hng thn thin, cng vi bn s c min ph giao nhn v min ph lp t khi mua hng.

 

Website:binhminhaudio.vn

Hotline: 0936 15 0936 0971 299 678

a ch: S 46 Ng 2 Ph Miu m c Dc M nh H Ni (Lin k TT Hi Ngh QG H Ni).

Thng s k thut loa nn vnh trn TOA TC – 615 :

 

  • Tr khng: 8
  • Cp p sut m thanh 108 dB (1 W, 1m)
  • p ng tn s 250 Hz 7 kHz
  • Bi / nc bo v IP65
  • Pha sau bao gm: nha ABS, mu xm
    (6 mm ng knh 600 mm chiu di)
  • Kch thc 400 376 (D) mm
  • Trng lng 3 kg
